reviews.review_text: Excellent food all around. The waiter had incredible recommendations. Some special drinks were their rum with sweet chili and their sangria slush. Also their specialty dessert was a nougat ice cream cake with an almond sauce reduction (similar to a caramel). Their main dishes (The Burger, Lobster Ravioli and Seafood Paella) were all spectacular.

This is one of the best pizzas I ve ever had  was a sentence we said probably 3 times as we were eating there. We ordered the Tartufina pizza and it was DELICIOUS! It is such an interesting flavor between the honey roasted walnuts and the Gorgonzola cheese. The sweetness of the honey wasn t overpowering it just gave it a unique flavor at the end of the bite. I would 100% go back just for this pizza. The ambiance is so cozy and elegant yet funky inside. If it wasn t too hot, the patio would be a great option too, full of plants and it seemed like a spacious comfortable space. Vegetarian options: They had a couple vegetarian options on the menu, starting with avocado toast for brunch, some interesting appetizers like beet burrata, pasta options and pizza options. Of course, there are options of salads as well! The vegetarian here is happy

Everything we order was so good! Especially the tomato sauce in the lobster ravioli! Skinless red pepper cube with rose tomato sauce. Give it a try! Paella is good portion! We were sitting outside on the patio. I would definitely go back for sure! 2 people including cocktails, after tips is around $200.

What a gorgeous place to grab a bite. The service is excellent, shout out to Gavin humbling bartenders everywhere! We ordered the burrata &beets, which was delicious, had a variety of flavour and textural compounds that married beautifully. We added prosciutto to the burrata board and man was it a good call! Drinks to recommend: grounds for divorce, gambling witch, green tea  honestly I don t think you could go wrong! Awesome spot.

I am SO impressed by this place! First time customer and everything from the customer service to the ambiance, customer service, everything was perfect. I used the napkin as a  bib  cause I m a messy eater and they even provided me with a lint roller to clean up the lint!! Uhg the food was so good!!!

When you go out for an evening to dine, what are you craving for? Great atmosphere? Great Food? Great Service? Great Menu? Well.....we got that all here. The environment was actually stunning. It was tasteful, classy, chic and vibrant. Their bar is impressive and their food is creative and tasty. The Calamari was prepared the way Calamari is supposed to be prepared and unfortunately rarely is these days....but these guys got it down to a science. Fresh squid with the right proportion of batter, so the crisp accompanies the seafood and not the other way around. You taste the beautiful Squid with a light finish of batter paired with grilled jalapeno and two dips that were....well...bloody delicious. The Charred Chorizo with pita....what can I say about this beauty....just try it. Now for the Truffle Fries. Do you like Truffle fries? Well.....they serve the real ones here. Ive ordered them in several other places in Yaletown and they failed. They served me regular fries sprinkled some oregano on top, charged me for truffle fries and that was it. With these guys ..you get Truffle Fries. The service was impressive. We were always take care of on a Saturday evening. Cassie was great and we also had other staff being attentive, coming by and making sure all is well. Smiles, hard work, attention and appreciation with wonderful food and a bar that doesnt compromise. What else could you ask for on a Saturday evening out?! Will be back.

We enjoyed our food and drinks. I love the floor plan, tables are not too close to each other which allows for privacy. The elevated floor for the pizza corner is a nice touch, you can see the chef/baker/cook preparing your pizza to perfection. The vibe is happy but not noisy. Our host/server is graciously friendly.

Walked in without a reservation last night (Friday night) and immediately got a spot on their patio. Everything from drinks, food, wine, and service were outstanding. Our server was very personable, offering great recommendations, including finding out of a rare bourbon they had. The olives, best Ive had, and the bolognese brought me right back to Italy. I will absolutely be raving about this place to my clients and friends/family, and will be back again. Thank you for a great evening!

Wow, I truly had the best burger Ive ever had tonight! The concierge at the Hilton where were staying has steered us right two nights in a row for dinner. Top notch recommendations both were outstanding. We shared by two entrees, the THE BURGER an 8oz in-house handground organic Alberta beef, fresh challah bun, melted fontina cheese, truffle aioli and syrah caramelized onions with Crumbled bacon and sauteed mushrooms. and we also shared one of the nightly specials which was a mushroom and truffle filled ravioli in an asiago cheese type sauce. It was absolutely fantastic as well, but that burger. Oh my!   And our waitress tonight was a delightful young lady from Ukraine. She was so polite and just such a sweet person.
Our favourite pre concert date spot. This pizza is perfect in every way and the best Caesar salad in town. Service is always great, especially from Kat.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello, Thank you for the great feedback. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards per se Social Corner team

reviews.review_text: The  paella was the best Ive ever had the pleasure of eating . And the chef Fabio was kindly and attentive when his came   to our  table to say hi , this a high quality restaurant! you should try it

For my money, Per Se is home to the best pizza in Vancouver, and its not even a discussion. Absolutely elite. The dough is incredible, the unique options they have for pizza are unparalleled, and the tapas selection ranges from hummus to carpaccio. Pizzas are cooked in authentic oven. They have many other options on the menu, so dont think you must have pizza, but it is hands down a solid choice. We went for lunch and ordered the Beef Carpaccio, and two pizzas - one called Criminale and the other called Carbonara. The Carbonara pizza tasted identical to the original pasta plate, but on a pizza. Magnificent. Environment and service were fantastic. Very attentive and professional servers. The atmosphere feels high-end with high ceilings and dark wooden beams holding bright bottles of liquor, or oil, or wine. Splendid to look at. Per Se is a MUST GO and Ill be back as soon as I can.
Great food great quality, great cocktails. The carbonara pizza wasn t my cup of tea although it was quite fresh and well made, the burger is to die for as is the carpaccio.

This is such a great restaurant. All of the food was delicious. The Seafood paella was plated so nicely and tasted awesome. I was skeptical about the fried eggs on the carbonara pizza, but it was actually amazing. Great ambiance and server was very nice too. Definitely will come back:)
I ve been here few times and their brunch was especially awesome! I really like their interior and vibes and the service is always good as well. looking forward to seating in the patio in summer!

Amazing gluten free food- they have gf calamari, and the best thin crust pizza; the flavour was phenomenal. I felt safe as a celiac and will definitely be back in the future. Its spendy though, so bring your coins!

This was our first visit and we quite enjoyed it! Tried the sable fish and the goat cheese pizza, and both were great! The sable fish came with a lovely risotto, but no veggies of any type - that would have been a nice addition.  Our desserts were both excellent - apple tart and nougat glace. The noise level was quite comfortable, allowing for easy conversation. Service was fast and efficient. Definitely go again.

We stumbled across this sexy little gem of a place after seeing it for months going to Homer Street or Tutto. The place is gorgeous. Inside, the food is very good and the drinks are great. Weve been there a couple times when going to see shows or even if we just want a nice dinner out on the town. Very, very nice inside and the staff were great. If you have a nice dinner with friends or a decent size group, it would be a great place for that with a pretty decent range of food on the menu and lots of cocktails and wine. So glad we found this place!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello  Ian, Thank you for the great feedback. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards per se Social Corner team

reviews.review_text: Excellent bar for a catch up or a date, their ceasar must be one of the best in the city and their Toronto drink is like a root beer float old fashioned. The last sip of that drink was just so creamy and delicious, the bartenders are friendly, attentive, and clearly know what theyre doing. The atmosphere inside in the evenings exceeded my expectations. With the diamond closing Ive been searching for another good cocktail bar and I feel like this place came out of nowhere. Highly recommend!

Cozy welcoming beautiful place with amazing decorations. Food is delicious. Staff are nice and professional. House made fungi pizza is delicious so as all other plates. Prices are high but relevant to experience and atmosphere you dine. Highly recommended.
Everything was amazing. Service was nice, atmosphere took you to believing you were sitting in Italy. Food was perfect especially the pizzas they make there
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Thank you for your 5 stars. We look forward to welcoming you back soon! Regards per se Social Corner Team

reviews.review_text: I ve been wanting to visit ever since I walked past and saw the beautiful patio - it was absolutely worth it. The pizza was extremely good, the dough nicely made and the toppings delicious. Loved the atmosphere too, as well as the staff; everyone was extremely polite, helpful and fun. Will go again for sure!

First of all, this review is based on ONE visit, so I havent tried much of the menu or experienced the service during busier hours. The dishes me and my wife ordered were just delicious. The burger, the salad, the drinks, the dessert. Everything was amazing. Our waitress made sure our glasses of water were never empty. The atmosphere is also quite nice. Decoration is great, you can see the oven for the pizzas, and the music selection is nice but not loud enough to prevent from having conversation. The prices I consider them fair enough. Sure, I could get a hamburger for less than half the price, but Im not lying when I say its been the best burger Ive had in months (or maybe years). Overall, it was great and Id go again to try other dishes.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello David, Thank you for the great feedback. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards per se Social Corner team

reviews.review_text: Was able to get a reservation for 16 people at 12:30pm! Everyone thoroughly enjoyed their meal. Great atmosphere and the service is top notch. One of the many reasons its one of my top restaurants in the city!

This restaurant is amazing  Food was delicious, especially gnocchi:) Our waiter gave us great recommendations. People complain about high prices in some comments, but this restaurant is in a Michelin guide, and it is worth it, and btw prices are decent. Highly recommend visiting!

I enjoyed my visit and dining with Social Corner. The atmosphere is amazing and cozy and the staff is super friendly. We were served by the amazing Lana who was friendly, kind, helpful, and professional and because we were craving Salomon which was not an Entre in the menu she recommended for us what we now call  The Lana Salad  which was her recommended dish which consisted of mixed ingredients from two salads the Insalata Verde Di Casa with added ingredients and the sauce from the goat cheese salad. She made this recommendation based on preferences we expressed and the salad was so delicious and had such balanced flavours (finished the whole plate as you can see in the attached photos). Her hospitality was great and I will most definitely recommend this place to my friends and will definitely come back and hopefully be assisted by Lana again!

Get ready to sink your teeth into the absolute best burger in all of Vancouver at Social Corner. Seriously, its a game-changer! The staff there are super friendly and create such a chill vibe that you cant help but enjoy every moment. Trust me, you wont find a burger anywhere else that packs in those incredible flavours like this place does. Its a total must-visit for all the burger lovers out there!
Best brick oven pizza.  Good service...super nice ambiance...great music . Would go back. Paella is not like the real thing...but its ok. Food
Wonderful! The food was delicious and the staff were all friendly. Our server was very knowledgeable and able to make good recommendations. The Chicken paella was amazing. Will defiantly go back.
Food was amazing!! We had lots of food. Highly recommend the carpaccio   We want to come back for brunch.

Nothing but raving reviews for this cozy yet sophisticated restaurant. I visited per se Social Corner with some family and friends and was left speechless. It was a truly awesome experience. If youre looking for the best burger in town or the sweetest staff this is the spot to for you. We tried the charcuterie board, the burger and even some of the pizzas, and everything was not only delicious but also prepared quickly and customized to our required dietary restrictions. Grateful to have had the great bar manager Julia recommend The Burger which we got all dressed and was drool worthy. The rest of the staff members were super kind and even the owner was there and said hello. The overall ambiance of the place is FAB and couldnt have asked for anything more. Everyone went above and beyond with the service and the small details. Looking forward to coming back soon and enjoying another Perfect Pear cocktail and The Burger with crispy goat cheese. Dietary restrictions: All dietary restrictions were aided to, including vegetarian and shellfish. Parking: Parking available on the street for a small price. Wheelchair accessibility: The restaurant is very accessible and there are no stairs throughout.

Delicious food, good atmosphere and super service. We ordered the Criminale pizza, and my friends think it was pretty good. All of us loved the seafood paella, and personally I thought the lobster ravioli was also very good. The desserts were the best part, and we ordered both the tiramisu and chocolate mousse. Our waitress was super professional and friendly, and she filled our glasses as soon as they ran out of water.

I recently had the pleasure of trying the much-talked-about blue goose beef burger at this establishment, and I must say, it lived up to the hype. The flavors were exquisite, and the burger was crafted to perfection. While it may be a bit pricey, its definitely one of the best burgers Ive ever had. To round out my meal, I also ordered the tiramisu, which was decent but paled in comparison to the star of the show - the burger. Im already looking forward to returning for the brunch version of this burger, and I highly recommend giving it a try if youre a burger enthusiast. Update:  I went back to this spot and tried the brunch version of the blue goose beef burger, and I have to say, it was just as phenomenal as the original. The burger came with some changes in the type of bun and a few other ingredients, but the core of the dish remained intact, and it was just as delicious as I remembered. Its always a pleasure when a dish exceeds expectations, and this burger did just that. If you havent tried it yet, I highly recommend giving it a go.

Friend took me here when I was back in town. The vibe felt sophisticated but laid back, I really like the clusters of soft spherical lights, and the wines and alcohol lining the walls behind the bar. The burger I got was rich and beefy, but the tapas I got (chorizo sausage) was just ok. The service was great in the sense that my glass of water was getting filled up every 5 minutes, but personally I found it a bit distracting.

I finally had a chance to visit this restaurant. I did not have a reservation but the staff (Carter) was very professional and friendly in accommodating me and a friend for a business dinner. The ambiance is very welcoming and relaxing with good music in the background. It wasnt too loud as if you were in a nightclub, unlike many of the Vancouver restaurants going for the nightclub vibe these days. The ambience is suitable for business, casual, or romantic dining experience. We were served by Petr. He was very pleasant and knowledgeable about the menu. Hes happy to make recommendations based on your food preferences. For dinner, I had a Caesar salad along with a gourmet style hamburger. I must admit that was one of the best burgers Ive ever had. The beef is freshly ground in the kitchen, which is why they can offer to serve it rare to well done. Mine was a perfect medium. The hamburger exploded with the flavor of meat, sauce, truffles, and battered caramelized onions. It had just the right taste and crunch to it. The Caesar salad was tangy. Not at all fishy. For desserts we had the tiramisu. It wasnt too sweet. I didnt taste any of the alcohol, but Im not sure if it had any.  I would have liked to see a thicker ladyfinger layer on the bottom, but the flavours are just right. Highly recommended. Overall I had a great experience and I look forward to going back and try other menu items. Parking: Theres street parking available.

Beautifully decorated restaurant with a sophisticated feel without being pretentious. Prince Poo has been here a few times before for business meals, always enjoying the lightly charred crust pizzas and tapas, but this review is on my own dime, so should be a little more objective ;) First, this is a premium priced establishment, but the value is definitely there. Staff are trained well.. they know how to treat their guests with friendly prompt service. Food was delicious. We enjoyed the rigatoni bolognese  rich wine infused flavours and pasta perfectly el dente. The seafood paella stole the show however, from the presentation, consistency of the rice, hint of charred flavour from the skillet, to the abundance of seafood.. it was awesome. Only critique would be the cocktail menu. While it boast many options, most in the $20+ range, very little caught my eye. I have no doubt they could make anything you asked for, but they seem to be lacking for those craving bourbon/rye/whiskey type drinks off the menu. Overall, a fantastic date night for Prince and his wife.. will come back again.

Wonderful spot for Italian cuisine. Great location on the outskirts of yaletown, which makes it convinced for a night out. The Pizza here is something else  fire oven and pizza chefs, fresh dough and great quality ingredients, a must. The pasta is also very good. I recommend getting some cocktails and listen to the live band. Great night .

It was a great experience and food! The service is as remarkable as the food. Recommend it for dates and going with friends; I went for brunch and I love it. The drinks could have an improvement - It is a must-go place Food : 5/5 |
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Daniella, Thank you for the great feedback. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards per se Social Corner team

reviews.review_text: One of my favorite places in Vancouver. Excellent Italian food in a great atmosphere. The staff are friendly and service is pretty quick. The vibe is  sort of lounge and fun. Great space and will continue to frequent. I recommend any of the pizzas and the beef carpaccio is amazing.
Long wait for seating / service slow but worth it for this charcuterie, garlic flatbread and burrata - also strongest  pick me up  drink I ve ever had Food

We went for a dinner,we were four people. We ordered drunken goat and crimanala.we also ordered Garlic bread. Overall Excellent food, great service and almost no wait. Went again and had the amazing experience. Starting with front desk person lily who made it really accommodating for us to get the table right away. This time we also tried their new desert Australian Pavalova. It s a must try at this place.
Tasty pasta and pizza. The ambience is so great to hang out with people. Highly recommend the restaurant.

Had the brunch burger and I have now discovered my new favourite burger. It s a little pricy at $36 but the first bite convinced me it was well worth the price tag. Would highly recommend checking it out if you are in the area.

10            for per se Social Corner. Its Interior and light are mesmerizing,  you must see inside to enjoy their wall decoration. Huge pizza oven. Talented barista. All staff member super duper and knowledgeable, they explain about tiny cute pepper we never saw in life. Food itself served pretty and tasty. Will coming back soon

The best burger in town!! Be prepared to be messy because their burgers are so juicy! I was licking my fingers and had to go to the washroom to make sure nothing s on my face. Their drinks and tapas are decent, too.
Absolutely amazing restaurant. Food, Service, Location and Price were absolutely perfect. I recommend the pizza tartufina! Definitely a place to go Vegetarian options: Auch veggies werden hier fundig

A very nice and elegant restaurant in the heart of Vancouver downtown. We tried the CACIO E PEPE pasta, CRIMINALE pizza and The food was very delicious and the CHICKEN PAELLA and they were all very delicious. The service was professional and our server was very friendly.
Amazing food and service! Highly recommend the ravioli and burger!

So many times I walked near this beautiful place and since the first time I wanted to visit it. The decoration is so nice, inside and outside. We ordered the chicken  paella with Tiger prawns and was just amazing. One dish was enough for sharing with my partner. My drink was the Jamaican Fizz, which is sweet with a spicy feeling at the end of each sip, I loved it.  For a wonderful closure we ordered the chocolate creeme brulee with a cup of coffee. We enjoyed a lot. Staff was so kind and the service was perfect. I highly recommend it for a delicious and comfy experience.

We stumbled upon this restaurant and didn t know this is a Michelin guide recommendation so we weren t really expecting much. But it turn out to be a huge success. Ambience was great. Food was great. Our waiter Mateo B recommended all the right food. Service was fantastic. Will definitely come back again.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Thank you for the great review. We look forward to welcoming you back. Regards per se Social Corner Team

reviews.review_text: An excellent place to eat and socialize. Dinner of the process did seem high initially, but with the good came out was well worth it. Even my sons burger was super delicious with excellent presentation. Gotta go there again. I do want to try the pizza!

If money is not a problem you won t go wrong with this place. The food and drinks are delicious and the service is excellent. I went in with a group of colleagues for dinner on a warm 25 C Friday Night. They have good air conditioning inside and sidewalk patio outside. The place is beautiful. Our waiter was knowledgeable, kind and patient and explained the menu for my dietary restrictions. I can t eat gluten or dairy and they had options and accommodations for that. Their gluten free in-house made bread is the best I ve had, we had it with the hummus as a tapa. Portions are generous. Music plays in the background at a low volume, quite comfortable environment, of course the busier it gets the louder it gets but the high ceilings and amount space helps a lot in terms of noise levels. They have the best spirits, carrying very well-known brands and types of tequila (Gin and others), they have the Whistler Forager gluten free beer. Vegetarian options: They had a good number of vegetarian options, all labelled in the menu and delicious looking. Dietary restrictions: There were accommodations for gluten and dairy free diets. They carry the Whistler Forager gluten free beer.

Hadnt heard of Per Se before, but happened to walk by. Patio looked beautiful, stuck my head inside and its just as nice inside. Next day we were here for lunch. Beautiful room,  great decorating, big windows.  Nice. My guest has food allergies,  staff were very attentive to our restrictions and gave us great confidence. Ordered the Crab Lobster Ravioli:  Delicious.  Nice thin pasta stuffed full of crab/lobster, the crustaceans were the star here. Covered in a rich mildly spicy sauce that didnt overwhelm. Yummy if unattractive dish. Next the Seafood Paella.  The real deal: saffron, bell peppers, lots of seafood, in a real iron Paella pan.  Missing the Socarrat, for most of the pan,  but I didnt mind much.  This was a delicious dish.  We left not a single grain of rice uneaten... With a Cappuccino it was $100 all in for two, good value for a treat lunch. So: Great room, elegant/informed service, delicious food. Would be a great date restaurant, so my next guest is my wife...shell love it.

This is one of my favourite spots to come eat!!!! They have the best breakfast, lunch and dinner!!! They have one of the best burgers I have ever had!!! The atmosphere is so welcoming and cozy.  The staff are friendly and accommodating to your needs! Also i must add they have amazing cocktails!! This is one place you NEED to visit!! 10/10 for food and service! Can t wait to come back.

Love the atmosphere. High ceilings, Latin music playing, great bar space and over roasted pizzas (including Nutella one). They have a patio space as well/heater. Staff is friendly and professional. Food is also delicious. Good cocktail list. Parking on the street sometimes is hard to find as everywhere in that area. Highly recommend for any occasion.
Very cool location, nice food (italian and spanish) and kind waiters. You can watch your pizza being prepared and it taste delicious.

Came here for lunch and loved the vibe. They have a great selection of food and beverages. The service was incredible. It s truly a  social corner  as most people come here with friends and colleagues. Would visit again.

Per se is one of those places in this city that you have to check it out regularly. Everything about this place is great, from food to service and atmosphere. I always enjoy my time here and admire the management team for the way they treat each and every individual. Try their pizza and every cocktail at bar cz its worth ittt!
This is a really nice place! All the food was delicious. Ill visit again. And if you visit here...Actually, I really recommend pizza.

This is one of my favorite restaurants in Vancouver. The food is delicious and the drinks are dangerously good! The staff are really friendly and their recommendations are really good. I dont usually like whiskey drinks but I really loved our servers recommendation which was the perfect pear cocktail. It was just a light and well balanced cocktail, basically Fall in a flute! (pun intended) I also recommend the criminale pizza plus mushrooms. It was really delicious.
The best burger I have had in Canada. They hand ground the beef, and only use the best cuts. Notably exceptional. Ive also had their pizza and pasta, everything is first rate, made with true care.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Ivan, Thank you for the 5 stars we hope to see you again soon. Regards per se Social Corner Team

reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this restaurant, I have been here three times now and each experience was top-notch. My fiance and I are usually on the pickier side of fine-dining, but this place beats any restaurant in Vancouver. Service is wonderful!!! Every single employee makes me feel welcome and greets me when entering, and the food is absolutely immaculate. try the rigatoni Bolognese!! This is my go-to fine dining restaurant, ambience is relaxing and welcoming.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello, Thank you for the great feedback. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards per se Social Corner team

reviews.review_text: Great place for dinners. It s one of my regular go-to places. The atmosphere is perfect for catching up with a friend, or for first dates. Drinks are lovely and service is prompt and warm. I d recommend it for the drinks and pizza especially.
Amazing med rare burger our server did a great job without disturbing our meal
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello John , Thank you for the great feedback. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards per se Social Corner team

reviews.review_text: Our Server Kathryn was amazing. My fiance and I went for a date night dinner and had the pleasure of being served by Kathryn. We were laughing the night away and it felt like she was just one of our friends. The food was great but Kathryn was the highlight.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Thank you for the great review. Kathryn will be delighted to hear the feedback We look forward to welcoming you back. Regards per se Social Corner Team

reviews.review_text: I came here to grab a bite for lunch. They have a beautiful flowery patio, great service, and delicious burgers! I havent tried their pizzas or tapas, but definitely will the next time Im in the area. The brunch burger. Im going to be thinking about it for a while - it was so juicy, came with a mouth watering onion jam, cheese, and an egg (cause its a brunch burger!). The meat was made to order - I got it done medium, it was perfect. The fries are really good here as well. Honestly, the only better burger Ive had was at Gordon Ramsay Burger in LV. I wish I came later in the day, cause I would have explored their cocktails more. I got the Jalapeno Smoke, it hit all the notes - sweet, a bit savoury, salty, and spicy. Totally loved it!

Beautiful design with a well crafted cocktail list and delicious housemade pizza. It was understandably packed on a Saturday night before our VSO performance. We did end up seeing some familiar faces later in the night. We were well attended to at the bar and received amazing full service, nothing short to the dining area. Adored the vibe, the drinks, the service, and the food. The only compain if I were to nitpick is that having a hook to hang a bag or coat below the counter wouldve been nice and made the bar sitting more comfortable.

Honestly the best food I ve ever had in Vancouver. My boyfriend and I came in for dinner one night. We shared a bottle of wine (I don t remember which one) that our waitress suggested. I m not a big wine person and neither is he, but it was as good as we thought wine was going to be. Our waitress was very knowledgeable and helpful. Unfortunately I don t remember her name. My boyfriend loves to ask questions when we dine and she was able to answer any questions he had. We ordered the margarita pizza, gnocchi, and the seafood pasta. It was all delicious but the gnocchi was on a whole other level. I still haven t had anything that compares !!

Per Se Social Corner never fails to deliver a delightful experience! It has consistently become our preferred choice for our business lunches and dinners. Avelino and the entire team are remarkably attentive and always extend a warm welcome without fail. The culinary offerings are truly exceptional, and the ambiance provides an ideal spot for social gatherings and professional meetings. A definite five-star experience!
Fascinating restaurant. Service and food was very good. Would be even nicer if there were a few more vegan options. Vegetarian options: A few more vegan options would be good.

Super amazing interior, and love the high ceiling and pendant lights. Such a cozy and funky vibes there! Food is good, not amazing though. A bit too salty for us. Portion is so big! Service is top notch! Lovely place for dating!
Nice atmosphere and welcoming service. Pizza is delicious (tried funghi one), so is calamari. Also can recommend pear salad.
Really nice burger when the foie gras is added. Multiple flavors blends in harmony.

We went for a work dinner, the ambiance was enjoyable, really liked how spacious it was inside. Good drink selection. Tried a bunch of appetizers, they were all great. The seafood linguine was just okay, it was a bit on the soggy side. Pizza was yummy.

This is a great place.  I ate at the bar, and Todd was extremely friendly and helpful.   They have a good, by the glass, wine list (good choice of BC wines).  The Lobster Crab Ravioli was very good, I loved the sauce which was not heavy with a slight coconut flavor.   The Pannacotta was recommended (I had never had it before), and it did not disappoint.

Such a great spot! The floor manager Alan was gracious and attentive making for a great dining experience . The cocktails are top notch (my go-to place for a negroni done properly) the food is also very good with an emphasis on using meats, cheeses, produce, and imported preserves that are very high quality and delicious. If you are looking for brick fire oven pizza, a charcuterie board, or pasta this is a fantastic spot. Definitely worth the visit.
Perfect for an upscale outing with the kids. Pizza was amazing, and the burger was epic.

per se Social Corner is one of the best restaurants in Vancouver and a must try for anyone visiting or living in the city! Everything from the delicious food (best burger in the city!), wonderful cocktails, beautiful patio and the most friendly staff members makes this a truly special place to visit and enjoy. The amount of detail, care and passion that went into designing the space and crafting the food and drink menu is evident and makes it stand out from other places in the city. Shoutout to the amazing team for all their hard work and for making everyone feel cared for and safe during these crazy COVID times! Highly recommend that everyone tries this place, I know that I will definitely be back soon! :)

The best burgur in Vancouver Go for it, the Alberta beef wont disappoint you, I added sauteed mushrooms which made it even more delicious. For desert we tried dark chocolate raspberry mousse and loved its taste. The vibe, staff and food are all amazing, definitely recommended.
Absolutely amazing atmosphere, food was good too and great selection of cocktails (you gotta try the Layers of Love!). Our server was really knowledgeable and fun! 100% would go back anytime.

I m writing this review after 5 times trying Social Corner s food. Located in the heart of downtown Vancouver, Social Corner is a well-decorated Italian cafe and restaurant. It also holds a nice patio with many Jasmine and Petunia flowers in spring and summer. What I find unique for this restaurant are its brick pizza oven, in-house Arabica beans coffee brand (Ciclo), home-made pastries and cookies, and Rosalinda Spanish bar. The food is different in this restaurant as much like its establishment and decoration. You can order anything and waiting for something delicious and different. My suggestions: Definitely, check the pizzas and it doesn t matter which one. The bread is made from a 36-hour fermented dough and finally made in a pizza oven. You ll love the pizza. For brunch, order Carbonara and for lunch, order Funghi (really amazing). Avocado and sourdough (brunch menu) could be your favorite with the option of adding poached eggs. Salad are generally good. I recommend Seafood Paella as a huge and rich portion with a fantastic taste. The coffee is above average, yet its something personal and depends on your taste. Most of te time the staff are professional and everything goes smooth. Out of many times, we just experienced a new server who was not perfect, yet high staff turnover is normal especially during Covid. Update: Spanish breakfast is good to try. Brunch Bravas is not good as a portion as its served with a lot of potatoes and one egg which is not as attractive as other options. Enjoy!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Pooya, beautiful review, super honest and on point, We could not agree more, let us know when you are in next time. (Ask for any of the managers and they already know who you are). Have a great weekend.

reviews.review_text: My go-to Yaletown spot. The food, the space, the cocktails, and the people are the best. I always get treated with so much kindness from the Per Se staff, indoor and outdoor seating is a dream, and the food never disappoints. Plus, they have the best burger in town.

Every single item on the menu is amazing from pizza, pasta, burger, salads etc!  Beautiful restaurant with a great vibe. Love the drinks and the bartender can customize a special drink for you depending on what your feeling.

Every time I visit Vancouver I make sure to come here! The food and atmosphere is always amazing, I tend to sick to the same thing ( Malibu pizza) but switch it up today for the ravioli. Amazing and my server Cassidy was outstanding

This restaurant has a really cool and beautiful decor. I was a solo patron and sat at the bar. The ambiance was very vibrant and fun. Definitely a good place to grab yummy drinks. Food was 8/10. So no complaints. I had the crab/lobster ravioli as my main entree with a sirloin cap side. I also ordered a fries tapa to start. I ordered too much food lol but it was yummy so I ate it all.

Really enjoyed my experience at per se Social Corner.  Really chill but also kind of lux atmosphere with a very nice patio.  Food is Italian and very good and priced decently.  The neighborhood (Yaletown) is also very cool.  Service was top notch. There isnt any parking from what I saw as an FYI
A pre-concert dinner at this cozy but well-designed Vancouver restaurant was the perfect start to the evening. Paella, calamari and delicious drinks. Food

Great service and food! My favourite item was the Burger there. Unfortunately, I did not take a photo of the cross-section, but the beef patty was cooked to a a beautiful Medium and was very juicy and had a nice crisp to it as well from fried onions! Adding mushrooms was additional cost, but was a nice plus. The fries were replaced with Truffle Fries
TOP NOTCH ITALIAN RESTAURANT IN VANCOUVER!!! I genuinely only had the best experiences at this restaurant. Awesome service, foods, drinks and ambience. Only thing is that it is so addictive :P
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello, Thank you for the great feedback. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards per se Social Corner Team

reviews.review_text: The BEST salad in the city. Seriously. Their goat cheese salad is ~chefs kiss~. Ive tried pretty much every single item on the menu and everything is perfection. From their salads, to pizza, pasta, and THE burger. Wow wow wow! I also really like their pizzas and pasta specifically because they use san marzano tomatoes in their sauces. The pizza with the chili infused honey is to die for. Their sangria and cocktails are also fantastic. Service is always great. One of my favourite spots in the city when I want quality & tasty food. Atmosphere is great too and decor.

Have been wanting to try this place for a while and glad I finally did. Everything was spectacular!!! For food I got the special of the day which was the mushroom and truffle ravioli. It was unbelievable! My husband got the burger which I took a bite of and was absolutely worth the hype. It is an incredible gourmet burger!! The service alone was a reason to keep going back. The server Liz was super great with recommendations. She even had her manager step in when we couldnt decide on a bottle of wine. He ended up recommending a wine that has definitely gone to the top of my list as a new favorite, the Pascal Jolivet Sancerre. Just an end to end great experience! Definitely going back and looking forward to their new location opening closer to me in Coal Harbour!!

On Sunday Oct. 1st, I was there with a friend visiting from out of town and Cassy was so accommodating to his drink preferences. My friends and I love stopping in while out on the town. The vibes were immaculate as always!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jackie, Thanks for the 5 star-review. Glad we hit the spot for you! Hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Food was ok. Not impressive but ok. Service was excellent! Beautiful lighting and nice atmosphere. We had a good time.
Great atmosphere on the patio, great food! They had lots of gluten free options for us and made sure we were well looked after. Cappuccino to finish it off was perfect. Lovely server too.
The food is just like they told me: it does worth every penny. Delicious burger and Mateo made the fancy atmosphere feels way more cozy and relaxing. Loved it
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Malcon, Thank you for the great review. We look forward to welcoming you back. Regards per se Social Corner Team

reviews.review_text: Enjoyed happy hour on the patio without any reservations on a Tuesday afternoon. A+ service (friendly and helpful FOH & waiters), beautiful decor (inside & out), big menu, exquisite food. The lobster and crab ravioli was delectable, and the funghi pizza was also a joy (they gave us our own scissors to cut the pizza with   a little strange but we enjoyed controlling our own portions). The white sangria was so gourmet and amazing flavours and aroma before, during and after. 100% Ill be back for more cocktails and for their absolutely beautiful decor

FANTASTIC bar restaurant on Homer near Robson. We came about it one night just walking through the neighborhood and noticed the decor. Super tall ceilings, artistic chandeliers, and brass decor make this bar/restaurant absolutely aesthetic to look at. The dim lights also make for a nice spot for date night. We ordered the ginger beer cocktail and fries which were both amazing. We also noticed that they have their own pizza oven in house! Overall fantastic place to go to on a friday/weekend night or on a date.

Went for some after work cocktails. The bar tender (Geoffrey) was awesome, made the best drinks, made sure I was happy and having a lovely time. Drinks were amazing (dangerously good!!), Service was great, place was lovely. Had a wonderful time, highly recommend!

Our server Tim was great and attentive! He made a recommendation for the special of the day A5 wagyu imported from Japan and it was amazing. The ravioli was perfect and full of crab and lobster. Calamari was soft and flavorful with a very light batter. We will be going back!

Fantastic Vancouver restaurant with wonderful service and amazing food/decor/ambience. Lana and Alan were incredibly friendly and welcoming, adding to the dining experience, which was delicious. Definitely recommend!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Don, Thank you for the great feedback. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards per se Social Corner Team
